ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY EXAM: AP Portable chest HISTORY: Chest pain. COMPARISON: None available. FINDINGS: The AP portable chest 90 degrees upright demonstrates mild cardiomegaly with normal pulmonary vessels. The lungs are well-aerated with no evidence of active pulmonary pathology. IMPRESSION: Mild cardiomegaly with otherwise normal exam.
